ARTICLE.TITLE: Law minister: Steps to be taken for speedy disposal of Abrar murder case
ARTICLE.TEXT:
File photo of Law, Justice and parliamentary Affairs Minister Anisul Huq Dhaka Tribune

Abrar, a second year student of Electrical and Electronic Engineering Department of the university, was beaten to death

Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs Minister Anisul Huq has said all necessary measures will be taken for a speedy disposal of Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (Buet) student Abrar Fahad murder case..

He said whoever was involved in the murder, regardless of their affiliations, will be brought to book and the trial would be completed to ensure justice.

The minister said this while delivering his speech at a program inaugurating the 10-storey Chief Judicial Magistrate Court building with an expense of Tk60.92 core in Noakhali on Thursday.
